item.title: Shop help plz!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

The logic is a little screwy. You are checking for amount over 50 million, not value. As for speed this will function terribly, I’d recommend storing only items which cannot be sold (as the list should be shorter), sort that array and then use binary search to speed up the process a little. Or you could store them all in a HashMap.

Read full topic

item.title: Shop help plz!

item.description:

im trying to make it so my sell to shop so players cant sell item worth 50m and over this is wha I got so far and it wont sell anything at all now

shopassistant.java
under
public boolean sellItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {

but this don’t work any ideas?

	if (c.myShopId == 52)
		return false;
	for (int i : Config.ITEM_SELLABLE) {
		if (i == itemID && amount >= 50000000) {
			c.sendMessage("You can't sell "+c.getItems().getItemName(itemID).toLowerCase()+"50 million or over.");
			return false;
		} 
	}
